Uses of Interface
imagingbook.pub.geometry.delaunay.Triangle

  • Packages that use Triangle 
    Package Description
    imagingbook.pub.geometry.delaunay
    This package contains implementation of the Delaunay triangulation in 2D.
    imagingbook.pub.geometry.delaunay.chew
    Implementation of the incremental triangulation algorithm proposed by Paul Chew.
    imagingbook.pub.geometry.delaunay.guibas
    Implementation of the randomized incremental algorithm described in Guibas, Knuth, Sharir, "Randomized incremental construction of Delaunay and Voronoi diagrams", Algorithmica, no.

    • Uses of Triangle in imagingbook.pub.geometry.delaunay

      Methods in imagingbook.pub.geometry.delaunay that return types with arguments of type Triangle 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<Triangle> DelaunayTriangulation.getTriangles()
      Returns a list of 2D triangles (implementing the Triangle interface) contained in this triangulation.

    • Uses of Triangle in imagingbook.pub.geometry.delaunay.chew

      Classes in imagingbook.pub.geometry.delaunay.chew that implement Triangle 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Triangle2D
      A Triangle is an immutable Set of exactly three Pnts.
      Methods in imagingbook.pub.geometry.delaunay.chew that return types with arguments of type Triangle 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<Triangle> TriangulationChew.getTriangles() 

    • Uses of Triangle in imagingbook.pub.geometry.delaunay.guibas

      Methods in imagingbook.pub.geometry.delaunay.guibas that return types with arguments of type Triangle 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<Triangle> TriangulationGuibas.getTriangles()
      Returns the triangles of the triangulation in form of a vector of 2D triangles.
